c74object.name: chebyshape~
c74object.description: chebyshape~ is an object for waveshaping an audio input using chebyshev polynomials of the first kind. The output is calculated (rather than using a table method), which means the parameters can be updated at audio rate. It should be noted that neither the input or the output are clipped at -1. or 1., so the output could become quite large if you are not careful. The input and / or output can be clipped to produce this behaviour if desired.
